sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.x_integrations_CrossScopeUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>x_integrations_CrossScopeUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var x_integrations_CrossScopeUtil = Class.create();
x_integrations_CrossScopeUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	sleep: function (dur) {
		gs.sleep(dur);
	},
    getXMLParameter: function (payload, value, byTag) {
        var result = "";
        var parameters = new GlideXMLParameters(payload);
        if (byTag) {
            result = parameters.getElementValueByTagName(value);
        }
        else {
            result = parameters.get(value);
        }
        return result;
    },
    type: 'x_integrations_CrossScopeUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-06 06:45:17</sys_created_on>

        <sys_name>x_integrations_CrossScopeUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_516cd29c1b3b33001c74fcc8cc4bcb82</sys_update_name>

</record_update>
